content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Mr. Li, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. Based on your inquiry, I would like to propose a rental price of 1,200 Euros per month. This price is competitive within the local market and reflects the value of the apartment, which is 25 square meters in size.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1100 Euros per month. Thank you for your offer. I am a student and I need to save as much as possible. I also want to be on good terms with my landlord.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for accepting my proposal, Mr. Li. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your understanding of the value of the apartment. As a landlord, I am glad to have a responsible and respectful tenant like yourself. I will ensure that the rental agreement is fair and transparent, and I look forward to a positive and mutually beneficial relationship.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to ask about the lease length. Can I negotiate this as well?

I am a student, and I don't plan to stay in the city for more than a year. Therefore, I would prefer a shorter lease term.

Thanks for your understanding.

Baihu Li
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Certainly, Mr. Li. The lease length is negotiable, and we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. Since you are a student and plan to stay in the city for only a year, I am willing to consider a shorter lease term. We could discuss a lease length of 6-12 months, depending on your preference. I will make sure to include the lease length in the rental agreement and provide you with a copy for your review.
name: Heinrich Heine
